document_data.mainbody:
Ulbegh was an inhabitant of Scornubel in the mid-14 century DR.
Late in the , Belgon Bradaskor made a remark to Tornar that the noblewoman who had slain Ulbegh last summer, strongly implying ,Summer in Faerun lasts from mid-Kythorn through Flamerule and Eleasis to mid-Eleint. As Spellfire starts in Flamerule and lasts for two months, and Hand of Fire ends before 1358, "last" summer has to be 1356, because the narration occurs almost certainly through autumn had it been the summer of 1357, it would likely not be referred to as "last" summer. was his source for the report that Ornrim had been replaced by a shapeshifter. Tornar knew it was Tessaril Winter.
